context:
Therefore, in this paper, our main motivation is to present new constructions of minimal logarithmic signatures for the orthogonal group Oₙ(q) , the special orthogonal group SOₙ(q) , the projective special orthogonal group PSOₙ(q) , the commutator subgroup Ω ₙ(q)  and one type of classical groups [1] — projective commutator subgroup PΩ ₙ(q)  with q  as a power of odd primes. For Oₙ(q)  and SOₙ(q) , the proposed MLSs have the similar structure [A, B^{′ }, G_w] , where A=〈 a〉  , and B^{′ }={ hC∣ h∈ B}  , C ≤ B , B=〈 b〉  , while G_w=P:Q  is a semi-direct product of a p -group P  and a direct product Q=GL₁(q)× Y  (see Table 1). We employ two canonical homomorphisms η : SOₙ(q)→ PSOₙ(q)  and θ : Ω ₙ(q)→ PΩ ₙ(q)  for proving the existence of MLSs for PSOₙ(q)  and PΩ ₙ(q) , respectively.
<TABLE>

[1].ref: Garrett P.: Buildings and Classical Groups. Chapman and Hall, London (1997).
